content:
How come the issue queue is so busy? I keep getting updates about every 5 minutes.

I am not complaining....

:-)
Depends what you're subscribed to I guess. Mines been quiet since morning :smile:

You're not alone @StPaulTim. Both @jenlampton and I have recently mentioned that we keep finding it harder and harder to keep up with the community activity in the issue queue and here in Zulip. That's exciting! :smile:
I am so happy about all the activity -- I'm having a hard time doing "real" work because I want to play in the issue queue instead
